Class FlightBookingSystemData

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.data.FlightBookingSystemData
public class FlightBookingSystemData extends Object
Manages loading and storing the entire FlightBookingSystem by delegating to various DataManager implementations (e.g. FlightDataManager, CustomerDataManager, BookingDataManager).

Also supports snapshot/restore functionality for rollback operations.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    FlightBookingSystemData.Snapshot
    A simple container class for storing lists of flights and customers at a given moment in time (for rollback or backup).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static FlightBookingSystemData.Snapshot
    createSnapshot(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Creates a snapshot of the current flights and customers (including their states) in the system, typically used before making changes that may need a rollback if storage fails.
    static FlightBookingSystem
    load()
    Loads data into a new FlightBookingSystem instance by calling each DataManager in DATA_MANAGERS.
    static void
    restoreFromSnapshot(FlightBookingSystem fbs, FlightBookingSystemData.Snapshot snapshot)
    Restores the system from a previously taken snapshot, discarding any recent changes.
    static void
    store(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Stores all data from the given FlightBookingSystem by calling each DataManager in DATA_MANAGERS.

      public FlightBookingSystemData()

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static FlightBookingSystem load() throws IOException
      Loads data into a new FlightBookingSystem instance by calling each DataManager in DATA_MANAGERS.
      Returns:
      a populated FlightBookingSystem instance
      Throws:
      IOException - if any data file cannot be read

    • store

      public static void store(FlightBookingSystem fbs) throws IOException
      Stores all data from the given FlightBookingSystem by calling each DataManager in DATA_MANAGERS.
      Parameters:
      fbs - the flight booking system to save
      Throws:
      IOException - if any data file cannot be written

    • createSnapshot

      public static FlightBookingSystemData.Snapshot createSnapshot(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
      Creates a snapshot of the current flights and customers (including their states) in the system, typically used before making changes that may need a rollback if storage fails.
      Parameters:
      fbs - the flight booking system to snapshot
      Returns:
      a Snapshot containing lists of flights/customers

    • restoreFromSnapshot

      public static void restoreFromSnapshot(FlightBookingSystem fbs, FlightBookingSystemData.Snapshot snapshot)
      Restores the system from a previously taken snapshot, discarding any recent changes.
      Parameters:
      fbs - the flight booking system to restore
      snapshot - the snapshot from which to restore
